entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
